settings.section_subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your trading goals

settings.title: Bot Suite - Best For Active Traders
settings.description: Perfect if you want fully automated trading with proven strategies. Ideal for those who want to trade without constant monitoring.

settings.title: Coaching & Indicators - Best For Learners
settings.description: Perfect if you want to develop your trading skills with professional tools and education. Ideal for those who want to understand the 'why' behind trades.

settings.title: Both - Best For Serious Traders
settings.description: Get the full Market Sniper experience: automated trading, professional indicators, comprehensive education, and complete community access.

settings.section_title: Which Product Is Right For You?
settings.section_subtitle: Not sure which to choose? Here's a quick guide

settings.question: What's the difference between Bot Suite and Coaching & Indicators?
settings.answer: Bot Suite includes the automated trading bot that executes trades for you 24/7, plus bot-specific support. Coaching & Indicators includes professional TradingView indicators, 60+ hours of educational content, and access to bot trade alerts (but not the bot itself). Both include private Discord access.

settings.question: Can I have both Bot Suite and Coaching & Indicators?
settings.answer: Absolutely! Many of our most successful members subscribe to both. You'll get the automated trading power of the bot plus the indicators and education to understand and optimize your trading strategy.

settings.question: Do I need the Professional Setup add-on?
settings.answer: The Professional Setup is optional. If you're comfortable with technology and want to configure the bot yourself, it's not necessary. However, if you want white-glove service with personalized configuration and one-on-one onboarding, the setup service is highly recommended.

settings.question: Can I switch between plans?
settings.answer: Yes! You can upgrade, downgrade, or switch between products at any time. Just email support@marketsniper.pro and we'll help you make the change.
